definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Bars and restaurants sit alongside industrial machinery and colossal container ships.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧和餐館就坐落於工業機械和龐大的集裝箱船旁邊。

sentences.english: Met with a containership in the opposite course 8 miles off the port side.
sentences.chinese: 在左舷8海里外，遇到一艘對開的集裝箱船。

sentences.english: A container vessel is overtaking us from port side.
sentences.chinese: 一艘集裝箱船正從左舷追越我們。

sentences.english: The best way is to get a containerized vessel destined for Vancouver.
sentences.chinese: 最好的辦法是找到一艘開往溫哥華的集裝箱船。

sentences.english: It has no containerships on its books currently.
sentences.chinese: 目前該船廠還沒有集裝箱船的訂單。
